data.text: @MassDPH @CDCgov @CharlieBakerMA GM, I would like 2 know why Phlebotomists are not on the list of allowed vaccinators? I'm MORE than qualified 2 inject someone w/vaccine drawn from a vial. So many positions 2 fill 2 get shots in arms. Been drawing & injecting husband w/insulins 30+yrs!  😊 Thanks

@MassDPH @MassLtGov @CDCgov So, BAKER & PELOSI why is Massachusetts ONE of FOURTEEN states that don't allow those 65 and over, even with modalities to get vaccinated? Is it the same reason you told vaccination sites to throw out left over vaccine at the end of the day instead of giving it out?
